TopicTitle: Can't see the target orbit line

Articles.Content:
Hi all ,

Pretty new to the game and enjoying it a lot , i have a contract for positioning a satellite in a specific orbit around the sun.

so i checked tracking station and could see a orbit line in the neighborhood of duna around the sun.

i build the satellite and brought it into orbit , but now i don't see the target orbit line , at tracking station i have everything ON except debris.

Help me obi-wan kerbin.

 

Right the last option was , Select the sun itself for orbit line..

Edited June 5, 2020 by Sixer
found answer
Check your mission control. You might have completed the contract already.
You can only see orbit lines in the same SOI as your camera. If the orbit is around Sun, you need your camera to be either targeting Sun or a vessel orbiting Sun.

On 6/5/2020 at 1:13 PM, Superfluous J said:

You can only see orbit lines in the same SOI as your camera. If the orbit is around Sun, you need your camera to be either targeting Sun or a vessel orbiting Sun.

Came here with the same problem, and this solved it.  Thanks!  Works both in the tracking center and from a craft plotting a maneuver.
